pages.text: "If each HUAJI Star can be considered a single star, what would countless HUAJI Stars polymerize into?"$()$(br)$(br)— No one knows which Senpai first posed this question, but for this query of his, the $(item)HUAJI Ultimate Polyfurnace$() might just give us the answer.

By throwing a massive amount of $(item)HUAJI Stars$() into the HUAJI Ultimate Polyfurnace and using HUAJI as fuel for polymerization, one can obtain the final result—the $(item)Infinite Universe Star$().$()$(br)$()$(br)Using the Infinite Universe Star, one can draw more Kichiku power from the previous universe, thereby crafting even stronger HUAJI items.
